title: K-Lite Codec Pack 995 Full.exe
description:
K-Lite Codec Pack is a collection of audio and video codecs for Microsoft Windows that enables the operating system and its software to play various audio and video formats. K-Lite Codec Pack also includes several related tools, including Media Player Classic Home Cinema (MPC-HC), Media Info Lite, and Codec Tweak Tool.

Every single media file can be played using Media Player Classic with K-Lite Codec Pack , very few available media players have this quality.

 The K-Lite Codec Pack has some major advantages compared to other codec packs :

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢It is updated frequently. So it is always up-to-date with the newest and/or best components.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢All components have been carefully selected for specific purposes. It is not just a random bunch of stuff thrown together.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢It is very user-friendly and easy to use.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢The installation is fully customizable, meaning that you are able to install just those components that you really want.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢The customization abilities even go beyond the component level. Some components are able to handle multiple formats.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢You can specify exactly which components should handle which formats. The pack can thus be fully tweaked to your own specific needs and preferences.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Uninstallation removes everything that was installed by the pack. Including all registry keys.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢It is extremely easy to make a fully customized unattended installation with the integrated wizard.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢It does not contain any bad, buggy or unstable codecs.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢It tries to avoid potential conflicts with other codecs installed on your computer. The installation is able to detect and remove over 100 different codec and filter packs.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢The pack is able to detect broken codecs and filters on your system, and helps you to remove them.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢It is a very complete package, containing everything you need to play your movies.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢This pack has a huge user base. This means that problems are found and resolved quickly.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢There are different variants of the pack. From very small to large.
